Make random symmetrical matrix A

Apply Jacobi rotations cyclically to get matrix V with eigenvector cols
Transformation counter = 8
Matrix V
0.49930899852768  -0.84872878842707  0.174212421154184  
0.443973123040304  0.423296952956255  0.789751578431971  
-0.744028487362631  -0.316984437020286  0.588168748472586  

Matrix D, which is A diagonalized

Is V^t*V==I? True
